description:
Regarded as one of Ohio's leading personal injury and medical malpractice law firms, Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, in Columbus offers unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Central Ohio and all across the state and the surrounding areas of northern Kentucky who suffered a serious injury or loss as the result of any of the following:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Birth and delivery injuries
  • Brain and spinal cord injuries
  • Surgical and hospital errors
  • Vaccine injuries
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Other personal injury and wrongful death claims

No matter the cause of your suffering, you can rely on us for highly personalized counsel to help you make the best-informed decisions. We will remain with you until the final resolution of your matter to ensure we have done all we can to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve.

Noted for our results, our law firm's attorneys have recovered tens of millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, earning our memberships in the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums. In addition, our lawyers have received AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers for our outstanding professionalism and legal abilities.

As further evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include seven total law offices across Ohio and northern Kentucky, and we have received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients as well as Superb client ratings on Avvo and the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys.

To discuss your needs with a member of our team and to find out how we can best help you secure a brighter, safer and more financially stable future for yourself and your loved ones, you can Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, to receive a free consultation by phone, in person or through video conference.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
